meanings.definition: The practice of abstaining from the use of animal products, particularly in diet.
meanings.sent1: Veganism is a lifestyle choice that avoids consuming any animal products.
meanings.sent2: Many people choose veganism to support animal welfare and reduce their environmental impact.
meanings.sent3: At the party, Sarah's commitment to veganism was evident when she politely declined the cheese platter.
meanings.sent4: In a world of fast food, veganism stands out as a beacon of mindful eating.
meanings.sent5: The documentary on veganism left a lasting impression on me, prompting me to consider a plant-based diet.

meanings.definition: A way of living that seeks to exclude all forms of exploitation and cruelty to animals.
meanings.sent1: Veganism advocates for compassion towards animals and aims to eliminate their suffering.
meanings.sent2: The principles of veganism extend beyond diet to encompass all aspects of life.
meanings.sent3: During the debate, Mark humorously argued that even his cat had embraced veganism.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of conflicts, veganism offers a peaceful coexistence with all living beings.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rescued animals at the sanctuary perfectly embodies the essence of veganism.
